channel.title: 459 Server Won't Start Help? REPP ++
channel.description:
[code]10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting hyperion... 10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... 10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... 10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready 10-May-2012 3:50:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... 10-May-2012 3:50:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... 10-May-2012 3:50:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... 10-May-2012 3:50:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. 10-May-2012 3:50:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... 10-May-2012 3:50:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. 10-May-2012 3:50:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... 10-May-2012 3:50:24 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1376518 objects. 10-May-2012 3:50:24 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 10-May-2012 3:50:27 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions 10-May-2012 3:50:28 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\npcDe finitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Access is denied) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Acc ess is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:140) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source ) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thats my error on start. Can anybody help?
The original source: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/254179-459-pja-included-webclient-more.html

item.title: 459 Server Won't Start Help? REPP ++
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting hyperion... 10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... 10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... 10-May-2012 3:50:20 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready 10-May-2012 3:50:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... 10-May-2012 3:50:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... 10-May-2012 3:50:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... 10-May-2012 3:50:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. 10-May-2012 3:50:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... 10-May-2012 3:50:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. 10-May-2012 3:50:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... 10-May-2012 3:50:24 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1376518 objects. 10-May-2012 3:50:24 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 10-May-2012 3:50:27 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions 10-May-2012 3:50:28 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\npcDe finitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Access is denied) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Acc ess is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:140) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source ) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

Thats my error on start. Can anybody help?
